x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: Wildlife Recovery would raise global awareness and drive urgent action for species that are on the brink of extinction. It would combine the power of storytelling, digital media, data analytics, and social campaigning to shine a light on the issues causing the reduction in number of the species on the "watchlist". Wildlife Recovery would allow users to learn about the animals, track their conservation status, and actively engage in campaigns, petitions, and fundraising efforts to support on-the-ground conservation initiatives, including a portal to report illegal hunting and poaching.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Very little is known by the general public about critically endangered and nearly extinct species, therefore, poaching and illegal hunting of these species go unreported and often encouraged by people who have a need for the byproduct of these species.
